attributes.action: make school days start later and end earlier
attributes.additional_details: Because I don't spend enough time with my family before and after school because I'm way too tired in the morning and way too tired after school, In my opinion, I think this would be a great starting time for kids and parents.
attributes.background: I think you should make school days start at 9:30 and end at 2:45

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Reduce school hours to 5 hours a day

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648774
